variable: long term care expense per day

stochastic_function: lambda age, gender, maximum_coverage_per_day: {0: 1.0} if maximum_coverage_per_day == 0 else {4959.45: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 100 else {7439.18: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 150 else {9918.90: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 200 else {12398.63: 1.0} if age == 75 and gender == 'female' and maximum_coverage_per_day == 250 else {0: 1.0}

evidence: long term care expense per day
